name: The Dream Team (Demo)
description:
Join Fruit, Rob, and Blue as they venture into the Dream Realm to save the Extended Dream Team from their own sleep with the help of Poppy, a resident of the Dream Realm!

Leave any questions, suggestions, or feedback in the Community section below so that I can address them!

This will be the same page for the full release, so you can bookmark this!

For users without Windows, a Browser Version is available by clicking the link below!  It doesn't run nearly as well as the downloaded version, but it's the only option I had to get the game to you guys...  Plus, it can now be played on mobile!

Browser Version: https://bouchardtb.itch.io/the-dream-team-demo-browser-version
